sources.title: Take My Life
sources.description: “Suspenseful and stylish” “Great ‘40s thriller” “Stylish britnoir gem” (IMDB reviews quotes). Worthy mystery and suspense drama with a solid cast and meticulous direction. Greta Gynt and Hugh Williams costar. Good production values. It isn’t gritty enough to be considered film noir, but it is a first rate thriller. IMDB rating 7.1. Directed by Ronald Neame (debut) Released in 1947. Complete print.

metadata.Plot: Philippa Shelley races against time to clear her husband Nicholas Talbot of a murder he did not commit. While she works on getting proof, the prosecution is doing all it can to force a conviction.
metadata.Writer: Winston Graham, Margaret Kennedy, Valerie Taylor
metadata.Actors: Hugh Williams, Greta Gynt, Leo Bieber
